production.description: Production configuration - UPDATE YOUR_DOMAIN_HERE with your actual domain

_instructions.1: Update 'YOUR_DOMAIN_HERE' in production config with your actual domain
_instructions.3: Or manually change 'current' to 'production' and run: python3 apply_config.py
_instructions.4: After changing config, restart your app: sudo systemctl restart binding

Telegram Bot.note: This will automatically use BASE_URL from config
